## Overview
This Python-based project builds a complete ML pipeline for predicting hospital readmission for diabetes patients.

It includes:

- Preprocessing  
- Feature engineering  
- SMOTE imbalance handling  
- Logistic Regression  
- Random Forest  
- SVM  
- SHAP model interpretability  

Rendered with Quarto using the Python Jupyter engine.
